Text: Your Request Dear Kevin Thank you for your inquiry on the FORD F FLARESIDE LARI My name is Scott Webband I one of the Internet Managers at Lawrence Marshall Dealerships The unit your requested information on Stock CFA Has a MSRP of You can purchase this unit for only TTL You must take delivery from the Internet Department with your special Internet code by close of business on September th to this special price Your special code is Please call me at so that I can make sure that I or one of my assistants will be available to help you with your purchase and insure you this low price I look forward to working with you If you have any additional questions please let me know Sincerely Scott Webb
